Package io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.util

Class TransientAtomicReference<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<T>
      • io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.util.TransientAtomicReference<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class TransientAtomicReference<T>
extends AtomicReference<T>
    An AtomicReference that, when serialized, replaces its value with null if it is not Serializable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        protected Object writeReplace()
        Called by ObjectOutputStream to replace this with the version that is written out.
        Returns:
        a copy that has this instance's value if Serializable, and null otherwise
